title: Ask an Angel PLUS Antonio Garcia Martinez vs. Apple with Zach Coelius | E1215
description: Zach Coelius joins Jason to answer live listener questions (1:09), and then the pair discuss Apple's recent debacle in firing Antonio Garcia Martinez after being pressured by employees (42:43). Check out the pod notes here: https://bitly.com/e1215notes
